archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a BSS Solution, I must be able to apply customer discounts with security controls in place, so that customers can be given discounts, have discounts removed, or have discounts changed in order to successfully convert a customer offer.

properties.value: Security control to be discussed (part of agreement, approvals)? A particular discount can be added for customers by VF employees. Security controls refer to making this process secure. This touches a topic of CPQ, a separate discussion is needed. To be confirmed if Base 1?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
